mapper.select: SELECT m.mentorid, m.userid, mr.mentoringid as mentoring_mentoringid, mr.mtitle as mentoring_mtitle, m.mentorcom, mr.mentoringprice as mentoring_mentoringprice, mr.mentoringimg as mentoring_mentoringimg, mr.mmemberidcnt as mentoring_mmemberidcnt, mr.mentoringdate as mentoring_mentoringdate,DATEDIFF(mr.mentoringdate,sysdate()) as date_difference, mr.mplace as mentoring_mplace, mr.mentorurl as mentoring_mentorurl, mr.mcaring as mentoring_mcaring FROM mentor m INNER JOIN mentoring mr ON mr.mentorid = m.mentorid WHERE m.mentorid=#{mentorid} ORDER BY DATEDIFF(mr.mentoringdate,sysdate()) DESC

SELECT m.mentorid, m.userid, mr.mentoringid as mentoring_mentoringid, mr.mtitle as mentoring_mtitle, mr.mentoringimg as mentoring_mentoringimg, mr.mentoringdate as mentoring_mentoringdate, mr.mplace as mentoring_mplace FROM mentor m INNER JOIN mentoring mr ON mr.mentorid = m.mentorid WHERE m.mentorid=#{mentorid}

SELECT m.mentorid, m.userid, mr.mentoringid as mentoring_mentoringid, mr.mtitle as mentoring_mtitle, mr.mentoringimg as mentoring_mentoringimg, mr.mentoringdate as mentoring_mentoringdate FROM mentor m INNER JOIN mentoring mr ON mr.mentorid = m.mentorid WHERE m.mentorid=#{mentorid} and DATEDIFF(sysdate(),mentoringdate)>=0 ORDER BY DATEDIFF(mentoringdate,sysdate()) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT m.mentorid, m.userid, u.username as user_username FROM mentor m INNER JOIN mentoring mr ON mr.mentorid = m.mentorid INNER JOIN user u ON u.userid = m.userid WHERE m.mentorid=#{mentorid}
SELECT *, u.username AS user_username FROM mentor m INNER JOIN user u ON m.userid=u.userid WHERE mentorid=#{mentorid}
